sentences.en: If you're new around here, then an extra warm welcome to you.
sentences.zh: 如果你是第一次看我的视频，那就要更热烈地欢迎你了！
sentences.phonetic_us: /ɪf jʊər nu əˈraʊnd hɪr, ðɛn ən ˈɛkstrə wɔrm ˈwɛlkəm tə ju/

highlight_entries.display_text: an extra warm welcome to you

sentences.en: I'm glad you've joined me today.
My name is Laura and I share motherhood, homemaking, lifestyle videos here on my channel.
sentences.zh: 我是劳拉，在我的频道里分享育儿、持家与生活方式的视频。
sentences.phonetic_us: /maɪ neɪm ɪz ˈlɔrə ænd aɪ ʃɛr ˈmʌðərˌhʊd, ˈhoʊmˌmeɪkɪŋ, ˈlaɪfˌstaɪl ˈvɪdioʊz hɪr ɑn maɪ ˈʧænəl/

sentences.en: Some of my videos are more motivational.
sentences.phonetic_us: /sʌm əv maɪ ˈvɪdioʊz ɑr mɔr ˌmoʊtəˈveɪʃənəl/

sentences.en: I'll take you along with me as I am cleaning or decluttering and some are more inspirational or restful where I am sharing kind of a typical day in the life and those videos tend to be a bit more peaceful and laid back and I do things more along lines of baking and painting and gardening and crafting.
sentences.zh: 比如带着你跟我一起打扫、整理收纳；另一些更偏向启发性或者轻松休闲的，比如分享日常的一天，这类视频倾向于更平和、更休闲，我会做些类似于烘焙、绘画、园艺和手工事情。
sentences.phonetic_us: /aɪl teɪk ju əˈlɔŋ wɪð mi æz aɪ æm ˈklinɪŋ ɔr diˈklʌtərɪŋ ænd sʌm ɑr mɔr ˌɪnspəˈreɪʃənəl ɔr ˈrɛstfəl wɛr aɪ æm ˈʃɛrɪŋ kaɪnd əv ə ˈtɪpɪkəl deɪ ɪn ðə laɪf ænd ðoʊz ˈvɪdioʊz tɛnd tə bi ə bɪt mɔr ˈpisfəl ænd leɪd bæk ænd aɪ du θɪŋz mɔr əˈlɔŋ laɪnz əv ˈbeɪkɪŋ ænd ˈpeɪntɪŋ ænd ˈɡɑrdənɪŋ ænd ˈkræftɪŋ/

highlight_entries.display_text: baking and painting and gardening and crafting

sentences.en: So if that sounds like something you're interested in, then I would love for you to subscribe.
sentences.zh: 如果这些内容听起来是你感兴趣的，那我非常希望你能关注我的频道。
sentences.phonetic_us: /soʊ ɪf ðæt saʊndz laɪk ˈsʌmθɪŋ jʊər ˈɪntrəstəd ɪn, ðɛn aɪ wʊd lʌv fɔr ju tə səbˈskraɪb/

highlight_entries.display_text: I would love for you to subscribe
highlight_entries.translation_zh: 我非常希望你能关注我的频道
